>There's nothing "only" about getting a bard to level 34. That's hard work.

Okay. You say casting once at the beginning then again when the mob
runs makes the druid lazy.

What would make a snarer NOT lazy? (realizing that even Snare takes mana)
Do you want them to set a timer and snare every 30 seconds? Every 60
seconds?

What do you expect out of your snarer to not call them lazy?
